participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Playful and creative, enjoys gaming and has a whimsical side.
participant_1.background: My feet hurt after long runs in my boots. I have a cat named Oscar who is my best friend. My hair is colored purple. I have a dice collection that my parents would think is childish. I sometimes play video games for hours on end, even though I know I should be doing something more productive.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and crafty, balances work and hobbies with a passion for creativity.
participant_2.background: I'd brag about how I'm able to balance my business and my love of crafts. I work at an insurance firm. I wear comfortable clothing that allows me to move freely. I make 35 million a year. I secretly love watching WWE wrestling.

content.text: Hey I'm new here! Whats up?
Not much, just enjoying the day! What are you up to?
Not much! Just hanging out with my cat, Oscar.
Cats are the best. I have one named Mittens. What kind of cat is Oscar?
He's a tabby. He's pretty chill, but he can be a handful sometimes.
Haha, yeah I know what you mean. My cat is always getting into trouble.
What do you do for fun?
I love to craft. I make a lot of jewelry and sell it online.
That's awesome! I love jewelry. I'm not very crafty, but I do like to play video games.
Oh cool, what kind of games do you like to play?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Skyrim.
Skyrim is a great game! I've played it a few times.
Yeah, it's really fun. I'm also a big fan of the Fallout series.
Fallout is another great series. I'm looking forward to the new one that's coming out.
Me too! I'm really excited to see what it's like.
Yeah, it looks like it's going to be a lot of fun.
